title: Juzo Itami Filmography
description: Juzo Itami (1933-1997) - Filmography ==================================== https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0411631/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1#director ------------------------------------------------------------- Enjoy the (almost) complete filmography from one of Japan's great directors. I cannot for the life of me find a copy of his first short movie - if anyone can find his debut 1962 short film Gomudeppou (aka Rubber Band Pistol), please let me know. Still looking for: Gomudeppou (1962) https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2075192 The films are ripped in various different codecs, but are all embedded in matroska (.mkv) containers. Use VLC to watch them. They all have working english subtitles(*), softcoded. If you have any problems watching it, Google is your friend, not me. As your IT helpdesk will fondly tell you, the files are all working here, so the problem is at your end. I only have a 720p rip of Tampopo, but would love to see all of them in higher resolution. Again, your help is appreciated. (*) Supa No Onna has hardcoded Chinese(?) subs, but working English subs softcoded as well. I couldn't find a clean copy. - Abner Doom, hoarder/collector Disclaimer: I did not rip these myself, but have found them elsewhere online, over a long period of time. I've merged the original movie files and their English subtitles into single .mkv files, changed the filenames, and in the process have lost the names of the original rippers, so my apologies, but also thank you to those who shared them in the first place. Share and enjoy. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - The movies - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Juzo Itami (1984) - Ososhiki (aka The Funeral) Juzo Itami (1985) - Tampopo (aka Dandelion) [720p] Juzo Itami (1987) - Marusa No Onna (aka A Taxing Woman) Juzo Itami (1988) - Marusa No Onna II (aka A Taxing Woman's Return) Juzo Itami (1990) - A-ge-man (aka Tales Of A Golden Geisha) Juzo Itami (1992) - Minbo No Onna (aka The Anti-Extortion Woman) Juzo Itami (1993) - Daibyonin (aka The Last Dance) Juzo Itami (1995) - Shizukana Seikatsu (aka A Quiet Life) Juzo Itami (1996) - Supa No Onna (aka Supermarket Woman) Juzo Itami (1997) - Marutai No Onna (aka Woman in Witness Protection)
